subject: expected = Exception not working
msgSnippet: Hello, I m trying to use the @Test(expected = Exception.class) annotation in order to test for an expected Exception.  My code is as follows: @Test(expected =
messageBody:
Hello,

I'm trying to use the @Test(expected = Exception.class) annotation in
order to test for an expected Exception. My code is as follows:

@Test(expected = ObjectRetrievalFailureException.class)
public void testGetNotExists(){

@SuppressWarnings("unused")
User user = userDao.get(121L);

}

I have verified that a Spring ObjectRetrievalFailureException
exception is thrown. My test is failing with the following:

Object of class [com.fidelity.shares.domain.User] with identifier
[121]: not found

org.springframework.orm.ObjectRetrievalFailureException: Object of
class [com.fidelity.shares.domain.User] with identifier [121]: not found
at com.fidelity.shares.dao.hibernate.HibernateGenericDao.get(Unknown
Source)
at
com.fidelity.shares.dao.UserDaoIntegrationTest.testGetNotExists(Unknown
Source)
at
org.springframework.test.ConditionalTestCase.runBare(ConditionalTestCase.java:69)

I am running jUnit 4.4.

Am I missing something?

Thanks,
Leo
